Source: Dataset Card for Catalonia Independence Corpus  https://github.com/ixa-ehu/catalonia-independence-corpus
Definition: In this task, we have Spanish and Catalan tweets for automatic stance detection. The data has three labels Against, Favor, and Neutral which express the stance towards the target -independence of Catalonia. If the tweet criticizes the independence of Catalonia then it's 'Against' and if the tweets support it then it will be labeled as 'Favor' also if the tweets state information or news  rather than stating opinion then it will be characterized as 'Neutral'.

Positive Examples.input: Tweet: Vull votar i votaré.  Hi ha quelcom que no em permet no fer-ho. Ara bé tinc un greu problema.  No sé a qui!!
Positive Examples.explanation: The tweet asks for the right to vote for the independence of Catalonia and it supports the movement so it will be characterized as 'Favor'.

Positive Examples.input: Tweet: Puigdemont porta a la Defensora del Poble europea la prohibició de l'acte a l'Eurocambra https://t.co/fera2Vdu6G https://t.co/eoAQbnEE1R
Positive Examples.explanation: The tweet states a piece of news with the HTTP link stating the ban on European Parliament and doesn't support or criticize so it will be labeled as 'Neutral'.

Positive Examples.input: @astridbierge @BernatDedeu @JoanTarda Es un estafador botifler i malparit
Positive Examples.explanation: The tweet target calls people who support the movement as scammer so it is labeled as 'Against'.

Negative Examples.input: Tweet: @Rampoina Tothom va amb mitjons i sandàlies #DetectiuConan3XL
Negative Examples.explanation: The tweets ask for the right of people to vote for the independence of Catalonia. Since it's not asking to take sides so a 'Neutral' stance would have been a correct one.

Negative Examples.input: Tweet: Ganes de plorar veient a #junqueras despres de 1any i mig de presó. Molta força!!!
Negative Examples.explanation: The tweet talks about taking prison for the movement time and ask for strength for independence. Since the tweet 'Favor' the independence so it's not a 'Neutral' tweet.
